I am a brand strategist and UI/UX wonk with a passion for devising efficient and elegant solutions to complex business problems. In other words, I try to make things that people actually want in their lives.

In no particular order, I love simple UI's, Wikipedia, good books, Instapaper, tea, cycling, good copy, and TED

I also look up to folks like Paul Graham, Elon Musk, Clay Shirky, Tom Hulme, Jim Coudal, Peter Thiel, Jan Chipchase, Fred Wilson, Dan Ariely and Saul Griffith.
